name: Future Aero Racing S Ultra - The Original Game Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Future Aero Racing S Ultra: The Original Game Soundtrack - Music by Jorge Ramon Puig

Includes 18 songs in .mp3 format. These sound tracks will be downloaded to your Future Aero Racing S Ultra Steam folder.

Track list:

  • 01. (01:24) - Welcomte to FAR S ULTRA
  • 02. (01:15) - Street City
  • 03. (02:03) - High Speed Oval
  • 04. (01:49) - Indutrial Park
  • 05. (01:44) - Paradise Beach
  • 06. (01:44) - Wood Lake
  • 07. (02:07) - Big Rock Canyon
  • 08. (01:48) - Snow Peak
  • 09. (01:56) - Street City Night
  • 10. (02:45) - Red Speed Oval
  • 11. (01:43) - Afternoon Paradise
  • 12. (02:48) - Industrial Circuit
  • 13. (01:40) - Rainning Forest
  • 14. (02:18) - Dark Canyon
  • 15. (01:53) - Foggy Peak
  • 16. (02:03) - Under Harbor
  • 17. (01:03) - Great Ending
  • 18. (00:41) - Start Your Engines
